ul.li: Java is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.

The JavaComm 2.0 library is Copyright (c) Sun Microsystems Inc. and distributed unmodified and according to grants in their license; the license are included in all distribution packages. (see JavaComm license).
The library is only distributed for satisfying the dependency of the serial transport related classes at compile time.
The MODBUS® and MODBUS/TCP® protocol are both a trademark and a fully owned product of Schneider Automation, distributed under a public license.

jamod is distributed with ant (http://jakarta.apache.org/ant), observing the respective Apache syle software license and the licenses of the required tool libraries (DOM, SAX, XERCES). However, these are only required for development (i.e. using the build mechanism).
